pages.title: Common
pages.text: Common: $(br)▁ 160 Malachite (Copper)$(br) ▁ 160 Azurite (Copper)$(br) ▂ 170 Coal$(br) ▂ 170 Assorted Quartz (Quartz / Certus Quartz)$(br) ▂ 170 Bauxite (Aluminum)$(br) ▃ 180 Galena (Lead / Silver)$(br) ▃ 180 Cassiterite (Tin)
Common: $(br)▃ 180 Teallite (Tin)$(br) ▃ 180 Autunite (Uranium)$(br) ▅ 190 Hematite (Iron)$(br) ▅ 190 Limonite (Iron)$(br) ▇ 200 Lapis$(br) ▇ 200 Cinnabar (Redstone)
